import React from 'react'; const Registration = () => { return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}
{/* Registration Section */}

Ready to Join the Battle?

Step into the arena where legends are born. Register now for ASTRA and become part of history.

Register Now
{/* Registration Info */}

Registration Guidelines

  • Registration fee is ₹500 per individual event and ₹1000 per team event
  • Last date for registration is December 10, 2024
  • Participants can register for maximum 2 individual events
  • Team events require a minimum of 5 members for basketball and 6 for volleyball
  • Confirmation emails will be sent within 24 hours of registration
  • No refunds will be processed after December 5, 2024
); }; export default Registration;
